Package com.peyrona.mingle.network.socket

Class SocketClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.peyrona.mingle.lang.japi.ListenerWise<com.peyrona.mingle.lang.interfaces.network.INetClient.IListener>

          • com.peyrona.mingle.network.socket.SocketClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.peyrona.mingle.lang.interfaces.network.INetClient
    public final class SocketClient
extends BaseClient4IP
    This class exposes a socket service (port is configurable) that can be used to communicate with the ExEn and is used by the ExEn to communicate back to the clients.

    It is mainly used to send requests to the ExEn or to retrieve the status of a device.

    Used protocol is defined by SocketProtocol class.

    Author:
    Francisco Jos√© Morero Peyrona Official web site at: https://github.com/peyrona/mingle
